articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher on energy boost - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened higher on Tuesday, a day after posting its worst day in over a week, as stronger crude prices boosted energy stocks.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher on mining stocks boost, encouraging economic data - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened higher on Thursday as mining stocks tracked higher bullion prices, while government data showed that domestic wholesale trade most likely rose by 1.1% in May sequentially.
